title: Monkeyshines No. 1
brief_description: Monkeyshines, No. 1 was shot by William K. L. Dickson and William Heise for the Edison labs. The series were filmed in the format of the Kinetoscope, and are believed to be the first films shot in the United States.

constellations_other.name: Innovation, technology and design: Edweard Muybridge
constellations_other.description: A focus on the discovery, inspiration and innovation at the heart of moving image history
